attributes.action: Keep E-Petitions - just in case you were thinking about scrapping them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,
This E-Petition site is an interesting first step into true democracy. You may not like the results and may even ignore what they say. However, this will gain momentum. If not here, somewhere else. So embrace it. 

Mr Brown, if you're next to take control - keep E-Petitions going. Mr Blair's team has something good here. Don't bin it because it is an old regime idea. 

This E-Petition website should be protected now and not deleted to make way for a big road price website.

Thank You.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
